<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">[Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=101" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 377 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** planetary

**Target** 1 creature you've telepathically contacted before
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

**Duration** varies
</row>

</column>

---

You send the target a message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer. Your message is insidious and has the effect of [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315), with the message substituting for the spoken suggestion. On a successful save, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day, and on a critical success, the target is temporarily immune for 1 month. You can target a creature only if you have previously been in telepathic contact with it before, such as via the [_telepathy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=337) spell.
name: Telepathic Demand
